description: Connect to Spain’s SIEX platform to retrieve farm data, register phytosanitary treatments, and export the CUE digital farm record book. Automate regulatory compliance and keep farm records accurate and up to date. Start by configuring your API and SID keys for secure access.

apiKey.description: SIEX API Subscription Key (Ocp-Apim-Subscription-Key) - Required for authentication

sidKey.description: SIEX SID Key (Ocp-Apim-Sid-Key) - Required for authentication

capabilities.name: siex_export_cue
capabilities.description: Export CUE (Cuaderno de Explotación - Digital Farm Record Book) for specific phytosanitary applications. Submits treatments to the Spanish Agriculture Administration (SIEX) for official registration. An email confirmation will be sent upon successful completion.

capabilities.name: siex_get_farm_data
capabilities.description: Retrieve farm exploitation data from SIEX for a specific REA (Registro de Explotaciones Agrarias) and year. This provides complete farm information including parcels, crops, and regional attributes.

capabilities.name: siex_register_phytosanitary
capabilities.description: Register a phytosanitary (pesticide/herbicide/fungicide) application for a farm. Records treatments applied to specific crop-location parcels.
